'''Curious Countenances of the Sacred Flame''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Curious Countenances of the Sacred Flame is obtainable from [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|30|x=240}}.

First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=90}}.
